/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The street is filled with cars and buses, indicative of the city's active transportation system. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, power lines crisscross against the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrancy and energy of the city.
